name: Cut Cut CUt
description:
You the Heart of the poker deck and drown to the coliseum fight off the clover and spades to survive the fight.

Control--------------------------------------------------------

W- Forward

D -Left

A - Right

S- Back

Right Click Mouse - Attack (hover over enemy)

Space - Dash (buggy :c)

Objective ---------------------------

Kill all waves of enemies before they kill you.

Creators-----------------------------

Kababeri https://itch.io/profile/kababeri

Diagno https://diagno.itch.io/

Pipoklan https://pipoklan.itch.io/

Art------------------

Characters : Diagno

Particle system : Kababeri

Character Animation : Diagno

Music / Sound ----------------

Crowd sound : Kababeri

Rest of sounds : Diagno

Coding -----------------

All Coding : Pipoklan
